title: Keir Starmer – 2020 Statement on UK/EU Trade Deal
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 24 December 2020.
content:
As leader of the Labour Party, I have urged the Government to get on with negotiating the Brexit deal that it promised.
